records.descriptionEN: Printed in blue on address cards supplied by Posti. Printed in black (length: 12mm) in the customer's own address card materials, with a free space of 3mm on the left and the upper edge.
Grouped according to the service-specific models.

Addresses of the sender of the Thermaltransfer sticker address label 20 characters per line, A5 laser-printed address label 35 characters per line. In both address labels detachable label part, the sender's addresses 2 x 35 characters.
